def_cn: 女孩子气的男孩;胆小怯懦的男孩
def_en: Some people, especially men, describe a boy as a sissy when they disapprove of him because he does not like rough, physical activities or is afraid to do things which might be dangerous.
If you describe an action or activity as sissy, you disapprove of it because you think it is only appropriate for girls or women.
